fchen

Class ProofData

  • java.lang.Object
    • fchen.ProofData

  • public class ProofData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the search result returned by the cloud, together with its correctness proof.
    Author:
    Chen, Fei (https://sites.google.com/site/chenfeiorange/), First draft on 12-03-2013. License: GNU GPL, Email: chenfeiorange@163.com

      • addProofData

        public void addProofData(MetaProofData temp)

      • validate

        public boolean validate(int leafSize,
               byte[] root)
        This function checks whether the proof is correct on its own.
        Parameters:
        leafSize - - number of total leaves
        root - - the root Hash value of the authentication tree
        Returns:
        If the returned result from the cloud is correct, return true; else false.

      • print

        public void print()
        This function prints out the whole proof data.

      • getAuthentication

        public MetaProofData getAuthentication(int i)
        This function gets the i-th authentication path, where 'i' starts with index 0.
        Parameters:
        i - - index
        Returns:
        An authentication path

      • setAuthentication

        public void setAuthentication(int i,
                     MetaProofData proof)
        This function sets the i-th authentication path.
        Parameters:
        i - - index
        proof - - The meta proof data
